metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000338 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DSA does not fully validate ASN.1 encoding of signature on verification. It is possible to inject extra elements in the sequence making up the signature and still have it validate, which in some cases may allow the introduction of 'invisible' data into a signed structure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-1000338` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbcmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcpg-java - 1.60-1
libbcpkix-java - 1.60-1
libbcprov-java - 1.60-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
